name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its grass-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups GRASS moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during strong sunlight.  This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.
